attributes.action: Require Sikh Parents to live as Sikhs of Nanak as an example to their children.
attributes.additional_details: Encourage citizens to be honest about their beliefs and practices, keep the good and eradicate the bad. No one is perfect, review reflect and change for a better society.
attributes.background: Encourage citizens to be honest about their beliefs and practices, keep the good and eradicate the bad. No one is perfect, review reflect and change for a better society.
